item.title: HELLION RADIO 50
item.description: HR-50TH ANNIVERSARY 1.VISIONS OF THE NIGHT-ETERNALLY SELF-VICTIMIZED 2.CONCRETE GRIP-PIN CUSHION 3.EXMORTUS-WAR GODS 4.MALEFICE- THE ENTITIES CD-EMPIRICAL PROOF (PART 1) 5.RISEN THROUGH THE ASHES 6.INTO A NEW LIGHT 7.DREAMS WITHOUT COURAGE 8.HISTORY REPEATS 9.TRAITOR TO ALL YOU KNOW 10.HORIZON BURN 11.EMPIRICAL PROOF (PART 2) 12.AS SKIES TURN BLACK 13.NOTHING LEFT 14.A WORLD DECEASED 15.BRINGER OF WAR 16.APOCALYPTIC VISIONS-TEETH 17.CORPORATION 187-TEACHING THE SICK, FEEDING THE DEAD 18.GUTWORM-DISFIGURED NARCISSUS 19.MALICIOUS DEATH-DEATHMARCH 20.SACRED CRUCIFIX-THE LAST PATH

item.title: Episode 47
item.description: SHOW #47 1.BENEATH THE EXTERIOR-DECAY THE DECEASED 2.MISBEGOTTEN-MISBEGOTTEN 3.PROSPERITY DENIED-PROSPERITY DENIED 4.MORTAL MADNESS-DEMONS 5.THE RED QUEEN EFFECT-THE CHAOS THAT BINDS 6.HIS IRATE LIFE-BLOOD MAKES GOOD LUBE 7.BANGLADESH-TAINTED DEMOCRACY 8.VINAGRON-ABEJAS ASESINAS 9.SCATHA-NO MERCY 10.SARCOMA-GLORIFICATION OF PAIN 11.ADRENACIDE-DROWN IN BEER 12.IBOGAINE-ZOMBI 13.GRINDMINDED-BEYOND RECOGNITION 14.ATHENA-AFTER THE REIGN 15.NECROPHAGOUS-OBLIVIOUS 16.GORGASM-FUCKING THE VISCERA 17.UNHALLOWED DISSONANCE-DELERIANT 18.DEADLIE-LEFT ALIVE 19.BUTCHERS BLOCK-LOCUST 20.ARCHITECT-HELL OF THE UPSIDE DOWN SINNERS 21.CONCIEVED BY FIRE-DECEMBER 22.ZONTOX-THE INEVIDABLE 23.RIBBED-MARCH OF THE PIGS 24.ROTT-KILLING SPREE 25.ONTOGENY-EXTERMINATE THE MERCIFUL 26.LEGIONS OF DESTRUCTION-LE AMARGATNEP

item.title: HELLION RADIO
item.description: WEEK 45 1.SPOOKHAUS-A XMAS CAROL 2.LEFT TO VANISH-COSMIC FLOW 3.THROUGH THE EYES OF THE DEAD-BENEATH THE DYING SKIES 4.D.T.S.-SKULL FULL OF SHIT 5.BURN THE SHROUD-ALL THE BLESSED 6.SUICIDE SILENCE-THE PRICE OF BEAUTY 7.NAPALM DEATH-WHEN ALL IS SAID AND DONE 8.THOUGHT LOST-ENDURING THE UNBEARABLE 9.CADAVER-TWISTED COLLAPSE 10.KAIZEN-SWARM OF LOCUST 11.REGURGITATE-EMETHIC JIZZ TREATMENT 12.JACKNIFE-A GLIMPSE OF HELL 13.FLATLINE-THE PASSING 14.UTOPIA BANISHED-THE SUMMONING 15.THE RED CHORD-DREAD PREVAILED 16.INFANTICIDE-DO NOT THINK DO NOT ASK 17.CANDY CANE-ERROR HUMANO 18.SEWN SHUT-TWELVE 19.ETERNITY BLACK-ANGELS INTO PANDEMONIUM 20.WE SHALL BE BLESSED-ESCAPE FROM CLOUD CITY 21.NOCTURNAL FEAR-FOG OF WAR 22.STRIGOI-THE NAMELESS 23.ENDEMIC-DEVOTION 24.SWORN AMONGST-NO TURNING BACK 25.NEGATIVE 263-CATASTROPHY 26.AT SUNSET WE RISE-CARVE YOUR EYES 27.SPOOKHAUS-SCARY LITTLE XMAS
